column2: Tumor was largely fluid filled; spanned majorily on the the left side
DCT-TVA; Braf CA; ink/arf f/f; pten f/f
Brain, lungs, heart, liver, kidneys, spleen, tumor
Tumor was filled with clear fluid. Small portion was actual solid tumor.
Heart looked slightly enlarged upon visual inspection.
Skull was still in tact. Possible mushy brain?
